casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert H. JOHNSON 174P18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Robert H. Johnson, for Johnson, Robert Harold.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of February 2019 by Defendant for a Rehearing:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
